quote-source: They’ll never win. But that’s why we love them.
quote-text:
Seagoon: I received my [conscription] papers. I read the sports page and reported for duty. Hup!
FX: [Fanfare, wobble; door opens]
Seagoon: Neddie Seagoon, reporting for duty, sir!
Grytpype: [without a beat] We’ll never win. Ahem… Name?
Seagoon: Seagoon.
Grytpype: Sex?
Seagoon: Yes, please.
Grytpype: With or without?
Seagoon: With.
Grytpype: I see. Now then Seagoon, what made you join the army?
Seagoon: An armed escort and two military policemen.
